index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing development, authorizing an agreement accepting a Housing Development Grant from the United States, Department of Housing and Urban Development to assist in the development of the Guiry Shillistad project; authorizing implementation of the project by the Department of Community Development; making an appropriation from the housing and community development revenue sharing fund and establishing a repayment account; and authorizing the Mayor or his designee to enter into necessary implementing agreements.
